{{Description|The canvas of stars is written upon this jade screen.}}
'''Jade Screen''' is [[Ningguang]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|particles|3.33}}
** The Jade Screen has an elemental particle cooldown of 6 seconds. With the 2nd constellation, consecutive use of the skill will not generate any particles.
* {{TalentNote|icd|Jade Screen DMG|0}}
* If it is not destroyed first, the Jade Screen will automatically shatter after 30 seconds.
* The Jade Screen, unlike any other Geo construct, can block enemy projectiles, but does not block projectiles or attacks from the player. It is not considered a shield, and enemy attacks that ignore shields are still blocked by the Jade Screen.
* The Jade Screen can be used to activate some [[Pressure Plate]]s, but not all of them.
* {{TalentNote|character=Ningguang|talent=Jade Screen|ascension|2|Strategic Reserve}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|2|Shock Effect}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|4|Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All Beneath}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|5|Invincible Be the Jade Screen}}
